ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Cameras: 4*Sony CCD Effio-E Dome Outdoor/Indoor 700 TVL Cameras, 3.6mm lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65.6 feet IR Distance. WDR (Wide Dynamic Range).;  2*Sony CCD Effio-E Bullet 700 TVL Cameras, 6mm lens, 36pcs IR LED, 198 ft IR Distance, WDR (Wide Dynamic Range)
8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR, 8CH D1 Recroding & 8 CH D1 realtime Playback, 2 USB port for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel D1 Real-Time Recording+Playback DVR 2TB HDD, 6 Sony Effio-E Cameras 700 TV Lines, iPhone Android Viewable
